summary: A greedy, manipulative media mogul seeks to capture Celebi for nefarious purposes, using the shape-shifting Pokémon Zoroark to hunt it down.
cast: Ikue Ôtani|Sarah Natochenny|Wayne Grayson|Emily Bauer|Erica Schroeder|Emlyn Elisabeth Morinelli|Sean Schemmel|Bill Rogers|Marc Thompson|Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld|James Carter Cathcart|Nick Sullivan|Kayzie Rogers|Michele Knotz|Brian O'Halloran|Annie Roland|Rodger Parsons|Eileen Stevens|Tom Wayland|John Hershberger|Jason Flores Contreras|Yuzuru Fujimoto|Kiyotaka Furushima|Megumi Hayashibara|Inuko Inuyama|Unshô Ishizuka|Takanori Jinnai|Natsuki Katô|Katsuyuki Konishi|Etsuko Kozakura|Rie Kugimiya|Kurumi Mamiya|Kazuya Masuda|Rica Matsumoto|Shin'ichirô Miki|Kenta Miyake|Shôko Nakagawa|Romi Pak|Ai Satô|Megumi Toyoguchi|Takashi Tsukamoto|Yûji Ueda|Kôichi Yamadera
title: Pokémon: Zoroark, el maestro de ilusiones
